meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Dan Viafore Mary Duffy Shadi Peterman Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7585.

td.p: Dan Viafore, an audio engineer from Los Angeles, California
Mary Duffy, a games editor from Louisville, Colorado
Shadi Peterman, a high school history teacher from St. Louis, Missouri (whose 1-day cash winnings total $6,800)

tr.td: HELLO, SUCKER!
STEPHEN KING'S BAD FOLKS
COUNTRIES OF THE WORLD
TOYS & GAMES
TV FOR THEE
IN VULNERABLE
(Alex: Each correct response will be a word made up of some of the letters in "vulnerable".)

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'the lemon (or lime)

Dan
')

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
